name: Nibû
description: Nibû is a real-time strategy game set in an alternate history ancient near east. Build, expand and fortify yourself in different scenarios to fight the oncoming armies of the allied hordes.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-Bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 @ 3.60GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Graphics: nVidia GTX750 TI , AMD Radeon R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
